sourcesContent: import { Box, Typography } from "@mui/material"; const OpeningHours = ({mediaQuery, t}) => { const schedule = [ { day: 'monday', hours: '10:00 AM - 8:00 PM' }, { day: 'tuesday', hours: '10:00 AM - 8:00 PM' }, { day: 'wednesday', hours: '10:00 AM - 8:00 PM' }, { day: 'thursday', hours: '10:00 AM - 8:00 PM' }, { day: 'friday', hours: '10:00 AM - 10:00 PM' }, { day: 'saturday', hours: '10:00 AM - 10:00 PM' }, { day: 'sunday', hours: '11:00 AM - 6:00 PM' }, ]; return( {t('hours')} {schedule.map((day, index) => ( {t(day.day)} - - - - - - {day.hours} ))} ) } export default OpeningHours;
